title: Action-Based Mathematical Leadership Program for Adult Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A course focused on helping learners acquire practical math approaches immediately applicable in workplace settings. Utilizes collaboration tools in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more mathematical analysis techniques when making data-driven decisions to solve workplace problems
Learners can design and execute budget allocation simulations for organizational performance improvement
Learners can develop metrics to quantify team members' work efficiency and write project-based assessment reports
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
